system.description:
Performance encompasses your ability to entertain through music, storytelling, or acting. It allows you to soothe tensions, distract enemies, or captivate an audience.

You make a Performance test to deliver a compelling performance, whether in a tavern, court, or campfire circle. Successes can be transferred to bolster the mood of listeners or influence their emotions positively.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Soothe Tensions – Calm agitated individuals or diffuse hostile encounters.
  • Distract Enemies – Divert attention away from allies or deceive opponents with a convincing performance.
  • Impress an Audience – Gain favor with spectators or sway their opinions through charismatic expression.
  • Convey Emotion – Evoke specific feelings such as joy, sorrow, or fear through your performance.
  • Create Atmosphere – Enhance the ambiance of a scene or establish a memorable presence.
